thread.title: Marvel Comics To Read Before Secret Empire
thread.title_full: Marvel Comics To Read Before Secret Empire

author: Jamie Lovett
title: Marvel Comics To Read Before Secret Empire
text:
Marvel Comics To Read Before Secret Empire Jamie Lovett Slide of 
In May, Marvel Comics will launch its next major event series, Secret Empire . 
Secret Empire is the culmination of everything writer Nick Spencer has been building towards since taking over as Captain America writer after the Secret Wars event. 
Steve Rogers has had his history altered by Kobik, a reality-warping cosmic cube in the form a 4-year-old girl. 
Now, Steve Rogers is a lifelong, loyal agent of Hydra, and Secret Empire is where he will make his move. 
If that seems like a lot to take in, ComicBook.com has you covered. There's a handful of Marvel Comics series that have lain the groundwork for Secret Empire and will likely tie closely into the event series going forward. 
Click the slideshow tab to see which Marvel Comics series you should catch up with before Secret Empire begins.
